CustomField.description: Auto calculate the slab reached based on base TO
CustomField.formula:
IF(Is_Conditional__c, case( slab_calc_method__c , "TO",
IF(Base_TO_Actual__c >= Slab_1__c && (Base_TO_Actual__c < Slab_2__c || ISBLANK(Slab_2__c)), 1 , IF(Base_TO_Actual__c >= Slab_2__c && (Base_TO_Actual__c < Slab_3__c || ISBLANK(Slab_3__c)), 2 , IF(Base_TO_Actual__c >= Slab_3__c && (Base_TO_Actual__c < Slab_4__c || ISBLANK(Slab_4__c)), 3 , IF(Base_TO_Actual__c >= Slab_4__c && (Base_TO_Actual__c < Slab_5__c || ISBLANK(Slab_5__c)), 4 , IF(Base_TO_Actual__c >= Slab_5__c && (Base_TO_Actual__c < Slab_6__c || ISBLANK(Slab_6__c)), 5 , IF(Base_TO_Actual__c >= Slab_6__c, 6 , null)))))), "Prog TO",
IF(Prog_TO_Actu__c*100 >= Slab_1__c && (Prog_TO_Actu__c*100 < Slab_2__c || ISBLANK(Slab_2__c)), 1 , IF(Prog_TO_Actu__c*100 >= Slab_2__c && (Prog_TO_Actu__c*100 < Slab_3__c || ISBLANK(Slab_3__c)), 2 , IF(Prog_TO_Actu__c*100 >= Slab_3__c && (Prog_TO_Actu__c*100 < Slab_4__c || ISBLANK(Slab_4__c)), 3 , IF(Prog_TO_Actu__c*100 >= Slab_4__c && (Prog_TO_Actu__c*100 < Slab_5__c || ISBLANK(Slab_5__c)), 4 , IF(Prog_TO_Actu__c*100 >= Slab_5__c, 5 , null))))),
null),null)
CustomField.label: Slab Reach - Actual
